title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 §§ 154-1.16 - Safety devices
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 §§ 154-1.16 - Safety devices

State Regulations

Rear view mirrors on the sides of an overwidth vehicle
may extend beyond the width stated on the permit, but they may not extend more
than six inches beyond the actual width of vehicle and load on each
side. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
§§
154-1.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
